hint.text: The size of each sector is proportional to the activity or information it represents.

solution.text:
Observe the pie chart carefully,
the students spends \(15\) percent of the total amount for purchasing plastic.
He also saves \(15\) percent of the total amount
Therefore, total expenditure on plastic is equal to the total amount saved.
